title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of shipments in millions, with a total of 19 data points.
Overall Number of shipments in millions has increased over the Year
Number of shipments in millions is gradually constant from 2001 to 2005, slightly decreasing from 2005 to 2006, and lastly roughly constant from 2006 to 2019.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2005 and 2006.
Max Number of shipments in millions about 6.47 was recorded at Year 2005
Min Number of shipments in millions about 3.42 was recorded at Year 2010
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of shipments in millions, with a total of 19 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2010 to 2019.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2005 to 2010.
But, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2003 to 2005.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2001 to 2003.
